tei:monogr.tei:title: Hours of Devotion
tei:monogr.tei:subtitle:
A Book of Prayers and Meditation for the use of the Daughters of Israel, during public service and at home, for all conditions of woman's life. Translated from the German "Stunden Der Andacht" Fifth Edition
Fanny Schmeidl Neuda
Translator Moritz Mayer
Hebrew Publishing Co. 1866

tei:biblStruct.tei:note: The transcriber has shared the text with a Creative Commons Zero Public Domain Declaration details at creativecommons.org.
